faq.headline: Got Questions? We've Got Answers
faq.description: Everything you need to know about ContentForge and our digital products
faq.question1: How can I trust the quality of your PLR products?
faq.answer1: Every digital product in our library is created by experienced content creators and subject matter experts. We don't accept low-quality or generic content. Each product goes through a rigorous quality review process to ensure it meets professional standards. Our content is inspired by best-selling products and top brands, ensuring you receive premium materials that your audience will value. Plus, with our 14-day money-back guarantee, you can try our products risk-free.
faq.question2: What exactly are Private Label Rights? Do I really own the content?
faq.answer2: Yes! Private Label Rights (PLR) means you get full ownership to use, edit, rebrand, and sell the products as your own. You can modify the content, add your branding, change the title, combine multiple products, or use them in any way you choose. There are no restrictions on how you monetize them. The only limitation is that you cannot resell the PLR rights themselves - but you can sell the finished products unlimited times to your customers.
faq.answer3: We offer a no-questions-asked 14-day money-back guarantee on all our plans. If you're not completely satisfied with the quality of our digital products or feel they don't meet your needs, simply contact our support team within 14 days of purchase for a full refund. We process refunds quickly through the same payment method you used. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we stand behind the quality of our products.
faq.question4: Do I need technical skills to use these products?
faq.answer4: Not at all! Our products are designed to be user-friendly and accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise. Most products come in standard formats like PDF, MP4, and editable document formats that you can customize using free tools like Google Docs, Canva, or any text editor. No coding, design skills, or expensive software required. If you can edit a Word document or create a simple presentation, you can work with our products. Plus, many items come ready to use immediately without any modifications needed.
faq.question5: How is ContentForge different from competitors?
faq.answer5: Unlike other PLR providers, we focus on quality over quantity. While others offer thousands of outdated or generic products, we curate only the most in-demand, up-to-date content that actually sells. Our products are created by experts, not AI or content mills. We constantly update our library with trending topics and modern strategies. You also get access to multiple formats (ebooks, videos, audio, templates, workbooks) in one place, saving you time and money. Plus, our pricing is transparent with no hidden fees, and we offer exceptional support to help you succeed.

howToRequest.title: How to Request a Refund
howToRequest.description: Requesting a refund is simple and straightforward. Just follow these steps:

step1.title: Contact Our Support Team
step1.description: Use our contact form within 14 days of your purchase date.

step2.title: Provide Your Order Information
step2.description: Include your order number, email address used for purchase, and the name of the plan or product you purchased. This helps us locate your order quickly.

step3.title: We Process Your Request
step3.description: Our team will review your refund request and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours. No lengthy explanations required‚Äîjust let us know you'd like a refund.

step4.title: Receive Your Refund
step4.description: Once approved, your refund will be processed back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.

processingTimeline.title: Refund Processing Timeline
processingTimeline.description: Here's what you can expect when requesting a refund:

item1.label: Request Acknowledgment:
item1.value: Within 24 hours of submitting your refund request

item3.label: Bank Processing Time:
item3.value: Depending on your bank or payment provider, it may take an additional 5-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account

processingTimeline.note: Note: The total time from request to seeing the refund in your account typically ranges from 7-15 business days.

refundMethod.title: Refund Method
refundMethod.description: All refunds are processed back to the original payment method used at the time of purchase.

conditions.title: Important Conditions
conditions.condition1: Refund requests must be submitted within 14 days of the original purchase date.
conditions.condition2: You must provide a valid order number or sufficient information to locate your purchase in our system.
conditions.condition3: After a refund is processed, your access to the digital products will be revoked.
conditions.condition4: We reserve the right to deny refund requests if there's evidence of abuse (e.g., multiple refund requests, downloading and redistributing content).
conditions.condition5: Custom digital product services may have different refund terms depending on the project stage‚Äîplease refer to your custom project agreement.

subscriptions.title: Subscription Cancellations
subscriptions.point1: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account dashboard.
subscriptions.point2: If you cancel within the first 14 days, you'll receive a full refund.
subscriptions.point3: Cancellations made after 14 days will stop future billing, but no refund will be issued for the current billing period. You'll retain access until the end of your paid period.

exceptions.title: Exceptions to Our Refund Policy
exceptions.description: While we strive to accommodate all reasonable refund requests, the following situations are not eligible for refunds:
exceptions.exception1: Refund requests submitted more than 14 days after purchase.
exceptions.exception2: Products that have been significantly used, redistributed, or resold commercially (though we understand you need to review the content‚Äîreasonable use is acceptable).
exceptions.exception3: Purchases made through third-party platforms or resellers not directly affiliated with ContentForge.
